item.title: Second Post
item.description: This is some more markdown List Item List Item Sub item I'm an inline-style link URLs and URLs in angle brackets will automatically get turned into links. http://www.example.com or http://www.example.com and sometimes example.com (but not on Github, for example). Inline code has back-ticks around it. let s = "Rust syntax highlighting"; println!("{}", s); s = "Python syntax highlighting" print s No language indicated, so no syntax highlighting.

item.title: First Post
item.description: This is some markdown Here is some code fn sum(a: i32, b: i32) -> i32 { a + b }
